title: Vaizard
sinopse: Soma is a Vaizard, a protector of ancient tombs and their priceless treasures. Young archeologist Asuke hires him, but this routine job turns deadly when an ancient magical relic - capable of destroying the world - is stolen by an evil madman. The Vaizard and the archeologist will have to fight their way through tomb raiders, ancient monsters, mind-controllers and mummies to save the world!
